name: car-booking-rest
description: ### Welcome to the developer interview project of the Audi Business Innovation GmbH. This file will give you a brief introduction to the technologies and software needed for this project. In the getting started paragraph there are the instructions to build and run the code.

scripts.install: cd node && npm i && cd .. & cd react/car-booking-frontend && npm i & cd ../..
scripts.setup-env: cd node && cp .env.example .env && cd .. & cd react/car-booking-frontend && cp .env.example .env & cd ../..

author: Nikhil Maguwala
